titleStmt.title: Where is the wise? Where is the Scribe? Where is the disputer of this world? Hath not God made foolish the wisdome of this world? Cor. I, 20.
titleStmt.author: Penington, Isaac, 1616-1679.

notesStmt.note: Attributed by Wing to Isaac Penington.
Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary, New York.
